official_title: Joint resolution to designate February 9 to 15, 1975, as National Vocational Education and National Vocational Industrial Clubs of America (VICA) Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to designate February 9 to 15, 1975, as "National Vocational Education and National Vocational Industrial Clubs of America (VICA) Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution to designate February 9 to 15, 1975, as National Vocational Education and National Vocational Industrial Clubs of America (VICA) Week.
